articles.author: Russell Contreras, Rebecca Falconer
articles.title: Biden to make history apology to Native Americans for Indigenous boarding school abuses - Axios
articles.description: It'll be the first time a U.S. president formally acknowledged the practice that's been linked to the deaths of over 900 children.
articles.content:
President Biden has formally apologized for the role the U.S. government played in abuses committed against Native American children in federal Indian boarding schools.
Why it matters: Biden's remar… [+2284 chars]
